text:
No, dont own a blog.

But I'll look into today thank you

No worries! One of the stumbling blocks I had to get over was demonstrating my production skills when I lacked the experience. I was able to demonstrate my passion for the industry and that's how I managed to find a way in. Having a blog, YouTube channel even an Instagram page, allows you to also show your passion and help you to stand out from the crowd

Also something you should have a look into is gaming conferences. I think the main ones for gaming are Develop conference in Brighton and EGX. I used to and still do attend relevant conferences for film and TV. Its a great way to network and start building some contacts
Ohh wow, yes definitely hopefully I can find a part time job an get the necessary equipment tomorrow I'm updating my CV an making a blog when it goes live I'll send ya a url :right-facing_fist:
